short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch fully synchronized YouTube videos with anyone!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever wanted to watch YouTube with someone at the same time? Introducing YouTube Sync!

YouTube Sync allows you to remotely watch videos with anyone at the same time. Featuring an intuitive interface and fast connections, watch with an unlimited amount of people whenever you'd like.

Version 0.1 Beta Release:
- Notes: Party host must be playing a YouTube video in order for a sync to work.
- Bugs: If a sync is not working and a YouTube video is playing on the party host's end, try refreshing the page or exiting out of the extension popup and then opening it again.
